00244 MainFrame::MainFrame( wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& caption, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style )
00245 {
00246         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)

00248                 this->m_scope_panel_array[ i] = NULL;

00252 }
00253 MainFrame::~MainFrame( ) {
00254         for( int i= 0; i< (int)this->m_size_X_control->GetCount(); i++) {
00255                 void *data= this->m_size_X_control->GetClientData( i);
00256                 if( data) {
00257                         delete (int*)data;
00258                 }
00259         }
00260 }

00453 bool MainFrame::CreateDynControls()
00454 {
00455     wxBoxSizer* common_panel_HBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxHORIZONTAL);
00456         this->m_common_main_sizer->Add( common_panel_HBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00457 
00458     wxBoxSizer* trigger_panel_HBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxHORIZONTAL);
00459         this->m_trigger_main_sizer->Add( trigger_panel_HBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00460 
00461     wxBoxSizer* record_panel_HBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxHORIZONTAL);
00462         this->m_record_main_sizer->Add( record_panel_HBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00463 
00464     wxBoxSizer* view_1_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00465         this->m_view_1_main_sizer->Add( view_1_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00466 
00467     wxBoxSizer* view_2_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00468         this->m_view_2_main_sizer->Add( view_2_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00469 
00470     wxBoxSizer* view_3_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00471         this->m_view_3_main_sizer->Add( view_3_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00472 
00473     wxBoxSizer* view_4_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00474         this->m_view_4_main_sizer->Add( view_4_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00475 
00476     wxBoxSizer* cursor_1_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00477         this->m_cursor_1_main_sizer->Add( cursor_1_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00478 
00479         wxBoxSizer* cursor_2_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00480         this->m_cursor_2_main_sizer->Add( cursor_2_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00481 
00482     wxBoxSizer* cursor_3_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00483         this->m_cursor_3_main_sizer->Add( cursor_3_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00484 
00485     wxBoxSizer* cursor_4_panel_VBoxSizer= new wxBoxSizer( wxVERTICAL);
00486         this->m_cursor_4_main_sizer->Add( cursor_4_panel_VBoxSizer, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00487 
00488         // Channel controls
00489         int ch_count= 0;
00490         int virt_ch_count= 0;
00491 
00492         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
00493         {
00494                 //size_t i= 0;
00495                 bool show_dac= true;
00496                 switch( ((GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->GetType())
00497                 {
00498                         case CVT_V1740:
00499                         //case DT5740:
00500                         //case N6740:
00501                                 ch_count= (((V1740Board*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->m_channel_group)<<3;
00502                                 show_dac= false;
00503                                 break;
00504                 }
00505                 for( size_t j= 0; j< ((GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->m_channel_array.GetCount(); j++, ch_count++)
00506                 {
00507                         //
00508                         // Common controls
00509                         CommonChControl *common_ch_ctrl= new CommonChControl( this->m_common_panel, show_dac);
00510                         common_ch_ctrl->SetupBoard( (GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i], j, ch_count);
00511 
00512                         common_panel_HBoxSizer->Add( common_ch_ctrl, 0, wxGROW|wxALL, 1);
00513 
00514                         if( !show_dac) {
00515                                 if( ((V1740Board*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->m_channel_group== (int)j) {
00516                                         //
00517                                         // Trigger controls
00518                                         TriggerChControl *trigger_ch_ctrl= new TriggerChControl( this->m_trigger_panel);
00519                                         trigger_ch_ctrl->SetupBoard( (GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i], j, ((V1740Board*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->m_channel_group);

00627                 this->m_DAC_sizer->Show( !show_dac);
00628                 if( !show_dac) {
00629                         this->m_trigger_channel_sizer->GetStaticBox()->SetLabel("");
00630                 }
00631         }
00632         return true;
00633 }

01340         this->m_grid_line_type_4_control->Append( _("DOTTED"));
01341 
01342         this->m_grid_line_type_4_control->SetSelection( 0);
01343 
01344         //
01345         // Number of samples per channel
01346         UINT32 num_ksamples_per_channel= 1024;
01347 
01348         char tmp[ 50];
01349         // HACK : MainFrame::CreateControls TBD for multiple board usage
01350         if( this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.Count())
01351         {
01352                 if( !((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[0])->GetBoardMemory( num_ksamples_per_channel))
01353                 {
01354                         wxLogError( wxString::Format( "Cannot read BOARD MEMORY capabilities: defaulting to %d K samples per channel\n", num_ksamples_per_channel));
01355                 }
01356         }
01357 
01358         int n_samples;
01359         for( int i= CVT_V1724_NBLK_1024; i>= CVT_V1724_NBLK_1; i--)
01360         {
01361                 if( ( n_samples= ( num_ksamples_per_channel<< 10)/( 1<< i))<= 0)
01362                 {
01363                         continue;
01364                 }
01365                 if( n_samples>> 10) {
01366                         sprintf( tmp, "%i K", n_samples>> 10);
01367                 } else {
01368                         sprintf( tmp, "%i", n_samples);
01369                 }
01370                 int *data= new int();
01371                 *data= n_samples;
01372                 this->m_size_X_control->Append( tmp, data);
01373         }
01374 
01375 /*
01376         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("1 K"));
01377         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("2 K"));
01378         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("4 K"));
01379         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("8 K"));
01380         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("16 K"));
01381         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("32 K"));
01382         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("64 K"));
01383         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("128 K"));
01384         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("256 K"));
01385         this->m_size_X_control->Append( _("512 K"));
01386 */
01387         this->m_size_X_control->SetSelection( 0);
01388 
01391         //this->m_ext_clock_control->Append( _("10   MHz"));
01392         //this->m_ext_clock_control->Append( _("40   MHz"));
01393         //this->m_ext_clock_control->Append( _("50   MHz"));
01394         //this->m_ext_clock_control->Append( _("62.5 MHz"));
01395 
01396         //this->m_ext_clock_control->SetSelection( 0);
01397 
01398         //
01399         // Sample block size 
01400         for( int i= 0; ; i++)
01401         {
01402                 wxChoice *ctrl= (wxChoice *)0;
01403                 switch( i)
01404                 {
01405                 case 0:
01406                         ctrl= this->m_sec_per_div_1_control;
01407                         break;
01408                 case 1:
01409                         ctrl= this->m_sec_per_div_2_control;
01410                         break;
01411                 case 2:
01412                         ctrl= this->m_sec_per_div_3_control;
01413                         break;
01414                 case 3:
01415                         ctrl= this->m_sec_per_div_4_control;
01416                         break;
01417                 }
01418                 if( ctrl== (wxChoice *)0)
01419                         break;
01420                 ctrl->Append( _("  1 nS"));
01421                 ctrl->Append( _("  2 nS"));
01422                 ctrl->Append( _("  4 nS"));
01423 
01424                 ctrl->Append( _(" 10 nS"));
01425                 ctrl->Append( _(" 20 nS"));
01426                 ctrl->Append( _(" 40 nS"));
01427 
01428                 ctrl->Append( _("100 nS"));
01429                 ctrl->Append( _("200 nS"));
01430                 ctrl->Append( _("400 nS"));
01431 
01432                 ctrl->Append( _("  1 uS"));
01433                 ctrl->Append( _("  2 uS"));
01434                 ctrl->Append( _("  4 uS"));
01435 
01436                 ctrl->Append( _(" 10 uS"));
01437                 ctrl->Append( _(" 20 uS"));
01438                 ctrl->Append( _(" 40 uS"));
01439 
01440                 ctrl->Append( _("100 uS"));
01441                 ctrl->Append( _("200 uS"));
01442                 ctrl->Append( _("400 uS"));
01443 
01444                 ctrl->Append( _("  1 mS"));
01445                 ctrl->Append( _("  2 mS"));
01446                 ctrl->Append( _("  4 mS"));
01447 
01448                 ctrl->Append( _(" 10 mS"));
01449                 ctrl->Append( _(" 20 mS"));
01450                 ctrl->Append( _(" 40 mS"));
01451 
01452                 ctrl->SetSelection( 0);
01453         }
01454 
01455         this->m_trigger_edge_control->Append( _("NO TRIG"));
01456         this->m_trigger_edge_control->Append( _("RISING"));
01457         this->m_trigger_edge_control->Append( _("FALLING"));
01458 
01459 }

01474 wxBitmap MainFrame::GetBitmapResource( const wxString& name )
01475 {
01476         // Bitmap retrieval
01478     wxUnusedVar(name);
01479     if (name == _T("exit_34.png"))
01480     {
01481         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("exit_34.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01482         return bitmap;
01483     }
01484     else if (name == _T("view_left_34.PNG"))
01485     {
01486         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("view_left_34.PNG"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01487         return bitmap;
01488     }
01489     else if (name == _T("view_bottom_34.PNG"))
01490     {
01491         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("view_bottom_34.PNG"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01492         return bitmap;
01493     }
01494     else if (name == _T("scope_lt.png"))
01495     {
01496         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("scope_lt.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01497         return bitmap;
01498     }
01499     else if (name == _T("scope_rt.png"))
01500     {
01501         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("scope_rt.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01502         return bitmap;
01503     }
01504     else if (name == _T("scope_lb.png"))
01505     {
01506         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("scope_lb.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01507         return bitmap;
01508     }
01509     else if (name == _T("scope_rb.png"))
01510     {
01511         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("scope_rb.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01512         return bitmap;
01513     }
01514     else if (name == _T("about_34.png"))
01515     {
01516         wxBitmap bitmap(AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _T("about_34.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
01517         return bitmap;
01518     }
01519     return wxNullBitmap;
01521 }

01556 void MainFrame::OnLeftWindowSashDragged( wxSashEvent& event )
01557 {
01558         if (event.GetDragStatus() == wxSASH_STATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE)
01559                 return;
01560 
01561         this->m_left_pane->SetDefaultSize(wxSize(event.GetDragRect().width, 1000));
01562 #if wxUSE_MDI_ARCHITECTURE
01563         wxLayoutAlgorithm layout;
01564         layout.LayoutFrame(this);
01565 #endif // wxUSE_MDI_ARCHITECTURE
01566         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
01567         {
01568                 this->ScopeRefresh( i, false);
01569         }
01570 }

01581 #endif // wxUSE_MDI_ARCHITECTURE

01584                 this->m_main_toolbar->Refresh( true);

01608 
01613 void MainFrame::OnCloseWindow( wxCloseEvent& event )
01614 {
01615         if( this->m_app_settings)
01616         {
01617                 for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
01618                 {
01619                         ::wxMutexGuiLeave();
01620                         (( GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->DoStopRunning();
01621                 }
01622                 {
01623                     wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
01624                         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
01625                         {
01626                                 this->m_scope_panel_array[i]->Freeze();
01627                         }
01628                         this->m_app_settings->Save();
01629                 }
01630                 delete this->m_app_settings;
01631                 this->m_app_settings= NULL;
01632         }
01633     event.Skip();
01634 }

01640 #include "virtual_board_channel.h"
01641 void MainFrame::OnCommonRunTogglebuttonClick( wxCommandEvent& /* event*/ )
01642 {
01643         this->DoStartStopRunning();
01644 }
01645 
01646 void MainFrame::DoStartStopRunning( void)
01647 {
01648         this->m_common_run_control->SetLabel( this->m_common_run_control->GetValue()? _("Stop"): _("Run"));
01649         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_common_run_control->GetValue() ? _("RUN"): _(""), STS_BAR_PANE_RUN);
01650         this->m_common_TTL_control->Enable( !this->m_common_run_control->GetValue());
01651         this->m_size_X_control->Enable( !this->m_common_run_control->GetValue());
01652 
01653         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
01654         {
01655                 ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->WriteTriggerMode( this->m_common_run_control->GetValue()!= 0);
01656                 if( this->m_common_run_control->GetValue()!= 0)
01657                 {
01658                         ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->DoStartRunning();
01659                 }
01660                 else
01661         {
01662             ::wxMutexGuiLeave();
01663                         ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->DoStopRunning();
01664                 }
01665         }
01666 }

01676         {
01677                 ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->WriteSoftwareTrigger();
01678         }

01686 void MainFrame::OnTriggerAutoTogglebuttonClick( wxCommandEvent& /* event*/ )
01687 {
01688         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
01689         int msk= this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_msk;
01690         if( this->m_trigger_auto_control->GetValue())
01691                 msk|= (int)AppSettings::SW_AUTO_TRIGGER_MSK;
01692         else
01693                 msk&= ~(int)AppSettings::SW_AUTO_TRIGGER_MSK;
01694         this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_msk= (AppSettings::TRIGGER_MSK)msk;
01695         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
01696         {
01697                 this->ScopeRefresh( i, false);
01698         }
01699         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_trigger_auto_control->GetValue() ? _("AUTO TRIG"): _(""), STS_BAR_PANE_AUTO_TRIG);
01700 }

01702 
01707 void MainFrame::OnTriggerExtTogglebuttonClick( wxCommandEvent& /* event */)
01708 {
01709         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
01710         int msk= this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_msk;
01711         if( this->m_trigger_ext_control->GetValue())
01712                 msk|= (int)AppSettings::EXT_TRIGGER_MSK;
01713         else
01714                 msk&= ~(int)AppSettings::EXT_TRIGGER_MSK;
01715         this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_msk= (AppSettings::TRIGGER_MSK)msk;
01716         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
01717         {
01718                 ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->WriteTriggerMode( this->m_common_run_control->GetValue()!= 0);
01719         }
01720         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
01721         {
01722                 this->ScopeRefresh( i, false);
01723         }
01724         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_trigger_ext_control->GetValue() ? _("EXT TRIG"): _(""), STS_BAR_PANE_EXT_TRIG);
01725 
01726 }

01788 void MainFrame::OnGridChooseColor1ButtonClick( wxCommandEvent& /* event*/ )
01789 {
01790         this->DoGridChooseColor( 0, this->m_grid_color_1_control);
01791 }
01792 void MainFrame::DoGridChooseColor( int scope_index, wxPanel *grid_color_control)
01793 {
01794         wxColourData colour_data;
01795         colour_data.SetColour( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index]);
01796         wxColourDialog *dlg= new wxColourDialog( this, &colour_data);
01797         dlg->Centre();
01798         if( dlg->ShowModal()== wxID_OK)
01799         {
01800                 wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
01801                 this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index]= dlg->GetColourData().GetColour();
01802                 grid_color_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index]);
01803                 grid_color_control->Refresh();
01804                 this->UpdateGrid( scope_index);
01805         }
01806         delete dlg;
01807 }
01808 
01809 bool MainFrame::UpdateControls( void)
01810 {
01811         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
01812 
01813         // Background controls
01814         this->m_back_color_1_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 0]);
01815         this->m_back_color_1_control->Refresh();
01816         wxBrush back_1_brush= wxBrush( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 0]);
01817         this->m_app_settings->SetBackBrush( 0, &back_1_brush);
01818 
01819         this->m_back_color_2_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 1]);
01820         this->m_back_color_2_control->Refresh();
01821         wxBrush back_2_brush= wxBrush( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 1]);
01822         this->m_app_settings->SetBackBrush( 1, &back_2_brush);
01823 
01824         this->m_back_color_3_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 2]);
01825         this->m_back_color_3_control->Refresh();
01826         wxBrush back_3_brush= wxBrush( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 2]);
01827         this->m_app_settings->SetBackBrush( 2, &back_3_brush);
01828 
01829         this->m_back_color_4_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 3]);
01830         this->m_back_color_4_control->Refresh();
01831         wxBrush back_4_brush= wxBrush( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ 3]);
01832         this->m_app_settings->SetBackBrush( 3, &back_4_brush);
01833 
01834         // Grid controls
01835         this->m_grid_line_type_1_control->SetSelection( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_type[ 0]);
01836         this->m_grid_line_width_1_control->SetValue( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width[ 0]);
01837         this->m_grid_color_1_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ 0]);
01838         this->m_grid_color_1_control->Refresh();
01839         this->UpdateGrid( 0);
01840 
01841         this->m_grid_line_type_2_control->SetSelection( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_type[ 1]);
01842         this->m_grid_line_width_2_control->SetValue( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width[ 1]);
01843         this->m_grid_color_2_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ 1]);
01844         this->m_grid_color_2_control->Refresh();
01845         this->UpdateGrid( 1);
01846 
01847         this->m_grid_line_type_3_control->SetSelection( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_type[ 2]);
01848         this->m_grid_line_width_3_control->SetValue( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width[ 2]);
01849         this->m_grid_color_3_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ 2]);
01850         this->m_grid_color_3_control->Refresh();
01851         this->UpdateGrid( 2);
01852 
01853         this->m_grid_line_type_4_control->SetSelection( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_type[ 3]);
01854         this->m_grid_line_width_4_control->SetValue( (int)this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width[ 3]);
01855         this->m_grid_color_4_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ 3]);
01856         this->m_grid_color_4_control->Refresh();
01857         this->UpdateGrid( 3);
01858 
01859         // Trigger controls
01860         this->m_trigger_ext_control->SetValue( (this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_msk& AppSettings::EXT_TRIGGER_MSK)!= 0);
01861         this->m_trigger_auto_control->SetValue( (this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_msk& AppSettings::SW_AUTO_TRIGGER_MSK)!= 0);
01862         this->m_trigger_post_control->SetValue( this->m_app_settings->m_post_trigger);
01863         this->m_trigger_edge_control->SetSelection( this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_edge_type);
01864         this->UpdateTriggerEdge();
01865 
01866         // Record controls
01867         this->m_record_dir_control->SetValue( this->m_app_settings->m_record_folder);
01868         this->UpdateRecordFolder();
01869 
01870         // Common controls
01871         // Search the matching block size
01872         this->m_size_X_control->SetSelection( 0);
01873         for( int i= 0; i< (int)this->m_size_X_control->GetCount(); i++) {
01874                 if( *( int*)this->m_size_X_control->GetClientData( i)>= this->m_app_settings->m_num_sample){
01875                         this->m_size_X_control->SetSelection( i);
01876                         break;
01877                 }
01878         }
01879         //if( this->m_app_settings->m_sample_block_size>= this->m_size_X_control->GetCount())
01880         //      this->m_size_X_control->SetSelection( this->m_size_X_control->GetCount()- 1);
01881         //else
01882         //      this->m_size_X_control->SetSelection( this->m_app_settings->m_sample_block_size);
01883 
01884         // Get best combo selection for sec_2_div setting
01885         const int num_sels= sizeof( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE)/sizeof( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[0]);
01886         double sec_per_div_1= 1/ this->m_app_settings->m_sec_2_div[ 0];
01887         for( int i= 1; i< num_sels; i++)
01888         {
01889                 if( ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1]<= sec_per_div_1)&& 
01890                         ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]>= sec_per_div_1))
01891                 {
01892                         if(( sec_per_div_1- SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1])< ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]- sec_per_div_1))
01893                         {
01894                                 this->m_sec_per_div_1_control->SetSelection( i- 1);
01895                         }
01896                         else
01897                         {
01898                                 this->m_sec_per_div_1_control->SetSelection( i);
01899                         }
01900                         break;
01901                 }
01902         }
01903         double sec_per_div_2= 1/ this->m_app_settings->m_sec_2_div[ 1];
01904         for( int i= 1; i< num_sels; i++)
01905         {
01906                 if( ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1]<= sec_per_div_2)&& 
01907                         ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]>= sec_per_div_2))
01908                 {
01909                         if(( sec_per_div_2- SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1])< ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]- sec_per_div_2))
01910                         {
01911                                 this->m_sec_per_div_2_control->SetSelection( i- 1);
01912                         }
01913                         else
01914                         {
01915                                 this->m_sec_per_div_2_control->SetSelection( i);
01916                         }
01917                         break;
01918                 }
01919         }
01920         double sec_per_div_3= 1/ this->m_app_settings->m_sec_2_div[ 2];
01921         for( int i= 1; i< num_sels; i++)
01922         {
01923                 if( ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1]<= sec_per_div_3)&& 
01924                         ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]>= sec_per_div_3))
01925                 {
01926                         if(( sec_per_div_3- SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1])< ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]- sec_per_div_3))
01927                         {
01928                                 this->m_sec_per_div_3_control->SetSelection( i- 1);
01929                         }
01930                         else
01931                         {
01932                                 this->m_sec_per_div_3_control->SetSelection( i);
01933                         }
01934                         break;
01935                 }
01936         }
01937         double sec_per_div_4= 1/ this->m_app_settings->m_sec_2_div[ 3];
01938         for( int i= 1; i< num_sels; i++)
01939         {
01940                 if( ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1]<= sec_per_div_4)&& 
01941                         ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]>= sec_per_div_4))
01942                 {
01943                         if(( sec_per_div_4- SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i-1])< ( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[i]- sec_per_div_4))
01944                         {
01945                                 this->m_sec_per_div_4_control->SetSelection( i- 1);
01946                         }
01947                         else
01948                         {
01949                                 this->m_sec_per_div_4_control->SetSelection( i);
01950                         }
01951                         break;
01952                 }
01953         }
01954 
01955         // Overridden into WriteSampleBufferSize
01956         this->m_app_settings->m_max_log_X= 100+ this->m_app_settings->m_num_sample;
01957         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
01958         {
01959                 (( GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->WriteSampleBufferSize();
01960         }
01961 
01962         this->m_offset_sec_1_control->SetValue( (int)(double)( this->m_app_settings->m_offset_sec[ 0]* 1000000.0));
01963         this->m_offset_sec_2_control->SetValue( (int)(double)( this->m_app_settings->m_offset_sec[ 1]* 1000000.0));
01964         this->m_offset_sec_3_control->SetValue( (int)(double)( this->m_app_settings->m_offset_sec[ 2]* 1000000.0));
01965         this->m_offset_sec_4_control->SetValue( (int)(double)( this->m_app_settings->m_offset_sec[ 3]* 1000000.0));
01966 
01967         //this->m_use_ext_clock_control->SetValue( this->m_app_settings->m_use_ext_clock);
01969         //{
01970         //      int sel= 0;
01971         //      for( ; sel< sizeof( CVT_V1724_EXTCLOCK_KHZ)/sizeof( CVT_V1724_EXTCLOCK_KHZ[0])- 1; sel++)
01972         //      {
01973         //              if( this->m_app_settings->m_ext_rate_MHz* 1000<= CVT_V1724_EXTCLOCK_KHZ[ sel])
01974         //                      break;
01975         //      }
01976         //      this->m_ext_clock_control->SetSelection( sel);
01977         //      this->UpdateClock( this->m_app_settings->m_ext_rate_MHz);
01978         //}
01979 
01980         this->AdjustTriggerPost();
01981         this->m_trigger_position_keep_control->SetValue( this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_position_keep);
01982 
01983         this->m_common_TTL_control->SetValue( this->m_app_settings->m_use_TTL);
01984         this->UpdateUseTTL();
01985 
01986         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
01987         {
01988                 this->ScopeRefresh( i, true);
01989         }
01990 
01991         // Status bar update
01992         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_app_settings->m_use_ext_clock? _("EXT CLK"): _(""), STS_BAR_PANE_EXT_CLOCK);
01993         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_trigger_ext_control->GetValue() ? _("EXT TRIG"): _(""), STS_BAR_PANE_EXT_TRIG);
01994         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_trigger_auto_control->GetValue() ? _("AUTO TRIG"): _(""), STS_BAR_PANE_AUTO_TRIG);
01995 
01996         // Common DAC control
01997         if( this->m_DAC_sizer->IsShown((size_t)0)){
01998                 if( this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount()) {
01999                         PhysicalBoardChannel* board_channel= ( PhysicalBoardChannel* )((GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[0])->m_channel_array[0];
02000                         this->m_ch_DAC_control->SetValue( (int)(double)( board_channel->m_DAC_offset_bit));
02001                         this->UpdateDAC();
02002                 }
02003         }
02004         return true;
02005 }
02006 bool MainFrame::UpdateGrid( int scope_index)
02007 {
02008         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
02009         int wx_pen_style= wxSOLID;
02010         switch( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_type[ scope_index])
02011         {
02012         case AppSettings::NO_LINE:
02013                 if( !this->m_app_settings->SetGridPen( scope_index, NULL))
02014                         return false;
02015                 this->ScopeRefresh( scope_index, true);
02016                 return true;
02017         case AppSettings::DASHED:
02018                 wx_pen_style= wxSHORT_DASH;
02019                 break;
02020         case AppSettings::DOTTED:
02021                 wx_pen_style= wxDOT;
02022                 break;
02023         case AppSettings::DASH_DOT:
02024                 wx_pen_style= wxDOT_DASH;
02025                 break;
02026         case AppSettings::SOLID:
02027         default:
02028                 wx_pen_style= wxSOLID;
02029                 break;
02030         }
02031         wxPen grid_pen= wxPen( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index], this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width[ scope_index], wx_pen_style);
02032 
02033 //      wxPen mid_grid_pen= wxPen( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color, ( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width<= 2)? 3: this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width<< 1, wx_pen_style);
02034         wxPen mid_grid_pen= wxPen( this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index], this->m_app_settings->m_grid_line_width[ scope_index]+ 1, wx_pen_style);
02035         if( !this->m_app_settings->SetGridPen( scope_index, &grid_pen, &mid_grid_pen))
02036                 return false;
02037         this->ScopeRefresh( scope_index, true);
02038 
02039         return true;
02040 }

02072 void MainFrame::DoChooseColor( int scope_index, wxPanel *back_color_control)
02073 {
02074         wxColourData colour_data;
02075         colour_data.SetColour( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ scope_index]);
02076         wxColourDialog *dlg= new wxColourDialog( this, &colour_data);
02077         dlg->Centre();
02078         if( dlg->ShowModal()== wxID_OK)
02079         {
02080                 wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
02081                 this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ scope_index]= dlg->GetColourData().GetColour();
02082                 back_color_control->SetBackgroundColour( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ scope_index]);
02083                 back_color_control->Refresh();
02084                 wxBrush back_brush= wxBrush( this->m_app_settings->m_background_color[ scope_index]);
02085                 this->m_app_settings->SetBackBrush( scope_index, &back_brush);
02086                 this->ScopeRefresh( scope_index, true);
02087         }
02088         delete dlg;
02089 }

02091 
02092 void MainFrame:: ScopeRefresh( int scope_index, bool erase_background)
02093 {
02094         if( MainFrame::g_scope_panel_array[ scope_index]== NULL)
02095          return;
02096     if( !MainFrame::g_scope_panel_array[ scope_index]->IsShown())
02097                 return;
02098         if( erase_background)
02099         {
02100                 MainFrame::g_scope_panel_array[ scope_index]->RefreshBackBitmap();
02101                 MainFrame::g_scope_panel_array[ scope_index]->RefreshLeftBackBitmap();
02102         }
02103 #ifndef __WXMSW__
02104         if( !::wxIsMainThread())
02105                 ::wxMutexGuiEnter();
02106 #endif
02107         MainFrame::g_scope_panel_array[ scope_index]->Refresh();
02108 #ifndef __WXMSW__
02109         if( !::wxIsMainThread())
02110                 ::wxMutexGuiLeave();
02111 #endif
02112 }
02113 
02114 void MainFrame:: UpdateSamplesReadyLed( bool is_on)
02115 {
02116 #ifndef __WXMSW__
02117         if( !::wxIsMainThread())
02118                 ::wxMutexGuiEnter();
02119 #endif
02120 
02121         MainFrame::g_samples_ready_control->SetBackgroundColour( is_on? wxColour(0, 255, 0): wxColour(255, 0, 0));
02122         MainFrame::g_samples_ready_control->Refresh();
02123 
02124 #ifndef __WXMSW__
02125         if( !::wxIsMainThread())
02126                 ::wxMutexGuiLeave();
02127 #endif
02128 }

02195 void MainFrame::UpdateTriggerPost( int value)
02196 {
02197         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
02198         this->m_app_settings->m_post_trigger= value;
02199         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
02200         {
02201                 ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->WriteTriggerMode( this->m_common_run_control->GetValue()!= 0);
02202         }
02203         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
02204         {
02205                 this->ScopeRefresh( i, true);
02206         }
02207 }

02213 void MainFrame::OnSecPerDiv1ChoiceSelected( wxCommandEvent& /* event*/ )
02214 {
02215         int selection= this->m_sec_per_div_1_control->GetSelection();
02216         this->UpdateSecPerDiv( 0, selection, this->m_offset_sec_1_control);
02217 }
02218 void MainFrame::UpdateSecPerDiv( int scope_index, int selection, wxSpinCtrl* offset_sec_control)
02219 {
02220         if( selection>= sizeof( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE)/sizeof( SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[0]))
02221                 return;
02222         if( this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_position_keep)
02223         {
02224                 double sec_2_div_old= this->m_app_settings->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index];
02225                 double sample_2_sec_old= this->m_app_settings->m_sample_2_sec;
02226                 this->m_app_settings->SetSec2Div( scope_index, 1.0/ SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[ selection]);
02227                 // recalculate offset to keep trigger position fixed on screen
02228                 double fix_old= sec_2_div_old*( this->m_app_settings->m_offset_sec[ scope_index]+ sample_2_sec_old*( this->m_app_settings->m_max_log_X- this->m_app_settings->m_post_trigger));
02229                 this->m_app_settings->m_offset_sec[ scope_index]= fix_old/ this->m_app_settings->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index]- this->m_app_settings->m_sample_2_sec*( this->m_app_settings->m_max_log_X- this->m_app_settings->m_post_trigger);
02230                 offset_sec_control->SetValue( (int)(double)( this->m_app_settings->m_offset_sec[ scope_index]* 1000000.0));
02231         }
02232         else
02233         {
02234                 this->m_app_settings->SetSec2Div( scope_index, 1.0/ SEC_PER_DIV_TABLE[ selection]);
02235         }
02236         this->ScopeRefresh( scope_index, true);
02237 }
02238

02267 bool MainFrame::UpdateRecordFolder( void)
02268 {
02269         if( !wxDir::Exists( this->m_record_dir_control->GetValue()))
02270                 return false;
02271         this->m_app_settings->m_record_folder= this->m_record_dir_control->GetValue();
02272         this->m_record_dir_control->SetBackgroundColour(wxColour(255, 255, 255));
02273         this->m_record_dir_control->SetToolTip( this->m_record_dir_control->GetValue());
02274         this->m_record_dir_control->Refresh( true);
02275         return true;
02276 }
02277 
02282 void MainFrame::OnRecordtogglebuttonClick( wxCommandEvent& /*event */)
02283 {
02284         wxString path= this->m_record_dir_control->GetValue();
02285         wxString file_name= _("caen_scope_");
02286         wxString date= wxDateTime::Now().FormatISODate();
02287         date.Replace( "-", "_");
02288         wxString time= wxDateTime::Now().FormatISOTime();
02289         time.Replace( ":", "_");
02290         wxString timestamp( wxString::Format( "%s_%s", date.c_str(), time.c_str()));
02291         bool start= this->m_record_start_stop_control->GetValue();
02292         bool use_max_buffer= this->m_record_max_buffers_check_box->GetValue();
02293         int max_buffers= this->m_record_max_buffers_control->GetValue();
02294         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
02295         {
02296                 (( GenericBoard *)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->ToggleRecordStatus( path, file_name, timestamp, start, use_max_buffer, max_buffers);
02297         }
02298         this->m_record_dir_browse_button->Enable( !start);
02299         this->m_record_dir_control->Enable( !start);
02300         this->m_record_max_buffers_check_box->Enable( !start);
02301         if( start)
02302                 this->m_record_max_buffers_control->Enable( false);
02303         else
02304                 this->m_record_max_buffers_control->Enable( this->m_record_max_buffers_check_box->GetValue());
02305         this->m_record_start_stop_control->SetLabel( this->m_record_start_stop_control->GetValue( )? _("Stop"): _("Start"));
02306         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_record_start_stop_control->GetValue( ) ? _("REC"): _(""), STS_BAR_PANE_REC);
02307 
02308 }
02309

02316 {
02317         // Show directory browse folder
02318         wxFileName org_dir( this->m_record_dir_control->GetValue());
02319         org_dir.Normalize();
02320         wxDirDialog dlg( this, "Choose a directory for recording", org_dir.GetFullPath());
02321         if( dlg.ShowModal()!= wxID_OK )
02322                 return;
02323         this->m_record_dir_control->SetValue( dlg.GetPath());
02324 
02325         this->UpdateRecordFolder();
02326 }

02393 bool MainFrame::SetStsBarText( const wxString& text, int pane_index)
02394 {
02395         if(( pane_index>= STS_BAR_NUM_PANES)|| ( MainFrame::g_main_statusbar== NULL))
02396                 return false;
02397         //::wxMutexGuiEnter();
02398         MainFrame::g_main_statusbar->SetStatusText( text, pane_index);
02399         //::wxMutexGuiLeave();

02401 }

02407 void MainFrame::OnTriggerEdgeChoiceSelected( wxCommandEvent& /*event*/ )
02408 {
02409         this->UpdateTriggerEdge();
02410 }
02411 void MainFrame::UpdateTriggerEdge( void)
02412 {
02413         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
02414         this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_edge_type= ( AppSettings::TRIGGER_EDGE_TYPE)this->m_trigger_edge_control->GetSelection();
02415         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
02416         {
02417                 ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->WriteTriggerMode( this->m_common_run_control->GetValue()!= 0);
02418         }
02419         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
02420         {
02421                 this->ScopeRefresh( i, true);
02422         }
02423 
02424         wxString sts_msg= _("");
02425         switch( this->m_app_settings->m_trigger_edge_type)
02426         {
02427         case AppSettings::FALLING_EDGE:
02428                 sts_msg= _("FALLING EDGE");
02429                 break;
02430         case AppSettings::RISING_EDGE:
02431                 sts_msg= _("RISING EDGE");
02432                 break;
02433         }
02434         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( sts_msg, STS_BAR_PANE_TRIG_EDGE);
02435 }

02447 void MainFrame::UpdateUseTTL( void)
02448 {
02449         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
02450         this->m_app_settings->m_use_TTL= this->m_common_TTL_control->GetValue();
02451         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
02452         {
02453                 ((GenericBoard*) this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->SetFrontPanelIO( this->m_app_settings->m_use_TTL!= 0);
02454         }
02455         this->m_common_TTL_control->SetLabel( this->m_app_settings->m_use_TTL? _("NIM"): _("TTL"));
02456         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( !this->m_app_settings->m_use_TTL? _("NIM"): _("TTL"), STS_BAR_PANE_NIM);
02457 }
02458 
02459 void MainFrame::AdjustTriggerPost( void)
02460 {
02461         int post_trigger= this->m_trigger_post_control->GetValue();
02462         if( post_trigger>= this->m_app_settings->m_max_log_X)
02463                 this->m_trigger_post_control->SetValue( this->m_app_settings->m_max_log_X- 1);
02464         this->m_trigger_post_control->SetRange( 0, this->m_app_settings->m_max_log_X- 1);
02465 
02466 }

02535 {
02536         this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]->Show( !this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]->IsShown( ));
02537         this->m_app_settings->m_show_scope_right_bottom_pane= this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]->IsShown( );
02538         if( do_check)
02539                 this->CheckScopeSplitters();
02540 }
02541 void MainFrame::CheckScopeSplitters()
02542 {
02543         if( this->m_scope_panel_array[0]== NULL)
02544                 return;
02545         //
02546         // Top Splitter
02547         if( !this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_LEFT]->IsShown( )&& !this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_RIGHT]->IsShown( ))
02548         {
02549                 // Hide Top splitter
02550                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Show( false);
02551                 if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->IsSplit())
02552                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Unsplit( );
02553         }
02554         else
02555         {
02556                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Show( true);
02557 
02558                 if( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_LEFT]->IsShown( )&& this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_RIGHT]->IsShown( ))
02559                 {
02560                         // Split Top slitter
02561                         if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->IsSplit())
02562                                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Unsplit( );
02563                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->SplitVertically( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_LEFT], this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_RIGHT]);
02564                         int width, height;
02565                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->GetClientSize( &width, &height);
02566                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->SetSashPosition( width/2, true);
02567                 }
02568                 else if( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_LEFT]->IsShown( ))
02569                 {
02570                         if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->IsSplit())
02571                                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Unsplit( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_RIGHT]);
02572                         else 
02573                         {
02574                                 if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->GetWindow1())
02575                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->ReplaceWindow( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->GetWindow1(), this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_LEFT]);
02576                                 else
02577                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Initialize( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_LEFT]);
02578                         }
02579                 }
02580                 else
02581                 {
02582                         if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->IsSplit())
02583                                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Unsplit( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_LEFT]);
02584                         else
02585                         {
02586                                 if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->GetWindow1())
02587                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->ReplaceWindow( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->GetWindow1(), this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_RIGHT]);
02588                                 else
02589                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->Initialize( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_TOP_RIGHT]);
02590                         }
02591                 }
02592         }
02593 
02594         //
02595         // Bottom Splitter
02596         if( !this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_LEFT]->IsShown( )&& !this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]->IsShown( ))
02597         {
02598                 // Hide Top splitter
02599                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Show( false);
02600                 if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->IsSplit())
02601                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Unsplit( );
02602         }       
02603         else 
02604         {
02605                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Show( true);
02606                 if( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_LEFT]->IsShown( )&& this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]->IsShown( ))
02607                 {
02608                         // Split Top slitter
02609                         if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->IsSplit())
02610                                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Unsplit( );
02611                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->SplitVertically( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_LEFT], this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]);
02612                         int width, height;
02613                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->GetClientSize( &width, &height);
02614                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->SetSashPosition( width/2, true);
02615                 }
02616                 else if( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_LEFT]->IsShown( ))
02617                 {
02618                         if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->IsSplit())
02619                                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Unsplit( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]);
02620                         else
02621                         {
02622                                 if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->GetWindow1())
02623                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->ReplaceWindow( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->GetWindow1(), this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_LEFT]);
02624                                 else
02625                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Initialize( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_LEFT]);
02626                         }
02627                 }
02628                 else
02629                 {
02630                         if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->IsSplit())
02631                                 this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Unsplit( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_LEFT]);
02632                         else
02633                         {
02634                                 if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->GetWindow1())
02635                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->ReplaceWindow( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->GetWindow1(), this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]);
02636                                 else
02637                                         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->Initialize( this->m_scope_panel_array[ SCOPE_POS_BOTTOM_RIGHT]);
02638                         }
02639                 }
02640         }
02641         //
02642         // Horizontal splitter
02643         if( !this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->IsShown( )&& !this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->IsShown( ))
02644         {
02645                 this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Show( false);
02646                 if( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->IsSplit())
02647                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Unsplit( );
02648         }
02649         else 
02650         {
02651                 this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Show( true);
02652 
02653                 if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->IsShown( )&& this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->IsShown( ))
02654                 {
02655                         // Split Top slitter
02656                         if( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->IsSplit())
02657                                 this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Unsplit( );
02658                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->SplitHorizontally( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top, this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom);
02659                         int width, height;
02660                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->GetClientSize( &width, &height);
02661                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->SetSashPosition( height/ 2, true);
02662                 }
02663                 else if( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->IsShown( ))
02664                 {
02665                         if( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->IsSplit())
02666                                 this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Unsplit( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom);
02667                         else
02668                         {
02669                                 if( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->GetWindow1())
02670                                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->ReplaceWindow( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->GetWindow1(), this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top);
02671                                 else
02672                                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Initialize( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top);
02673                         }
02674                 }
02675                 else
02676                 {
02677                         if( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->IsSplit())
02678                                 this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Unsplit( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top);
02679                         else
02680                         {
02681                                 if( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->GetWindow1())
02682                                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->ReplaceWindow( this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->GetWindow1(), this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom);
02683                                 else
02684                                         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->Initialize( this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom);
02685                         }
02686                 }
02687         }
02688         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_top->SetSashGravity( 0.5);
02689         this->m_scope_vert_splitter_bottom->SetSashGravity( 0.5);
02690         this->m_scope_horiz_splitter->SetSashGravity( 0.5);
02691 
02692 
02693         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
02694         {
02695                 this->ScopeRefresh( i, false);
02696         }
02697 }
02698

03014 
03015 void MainFrame::UpdateDAC( void) {
03016         PhysicalBoardChannel* board_channel= ( PhysicalBoardChannel*) ((GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[0])->m_channel_array[0];
03017 
03018         board_channel->m_DAC_offset_bit= this->m_ch_DAC_control->GetValue( );
03019         board_channel->WriteDACOffset( );
03020 }
